name.ja: キャットクロー・ガール

requirement.en: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Beast Type monster with 200 DEF from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned a Normal Monster by this effect, you can Set 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
